data.name: Oculus Video
data.description: Support for Oculus Video will be ending on June 15th 2023. You can now access and watch a growing library of immersive content in the updated Oculus TV app.

translations.long_description: Die offizielle Video-App von Oculus für deinen VR-Kinobesuch! Genieße ein völlig neuartiges Kinoerlebnis bei Trailern, Videoclips und deinen eigenen Filmen. Du kannst aus verschiedenen Virtual-Reality-Filmumgebungen auswählen, z. B. Heimkino, Multiscreen-Umgebung oder sogar die Mondoberfläche.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

translations.long_description: The official Video app from Oculus is your own movie theater in VR! Watch trailers, clips, and your own movie files in a completely new and immersive way. You can choose from multiple VR theater environments including a home theater, a multiscreen theater, and even the surface of the moon.

translations.long_description: La aplicación oficial Video de Oculus es tu propio cine en realidad virtual. Ve tráileres, clips y tus películas favoritas de un modo totalmente nuevo y envolvente. Puedes elegir entre distintos entornos de realidad virtual, como un cine en casa, un cine multipantalla y hasta la superficie de la luna.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

translations.long_description: L’application officielle Video d’Oculus est votre propre salle de cinéma en réalité virtuelle ! Regardez des bandes-annonces, des clips et vos propres fichiers vidéo de manière totalement inédite et captivante. Vous pouvez choisir parmi plusieurs environnements cinématographiques en réalité virtuelle, notamment un home-cinéma, un cinéma multiécran et même la surface de la lune.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

translations.long_description: Oculus의 공식 Video 앱으로 나만의 VR 영화관을 만나보세요! 바로 눈앞에 생생하게 펼쳐지는 예고편, 동영상 클립, 영화를 감상할 수 있습니다. 홈 시어터, 멀티스크린 극장, 달 표면 효과 등 다양한 옵션 중 원하는 VR 영화관 환경을 선택해보세요.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

translations.long_description: La aplicación oficial Video de Oculus es tu cine de realidad virtual personal. Mira avances, clips y tus películas favoritas de un modo completamente nuevo y envolvente. Puedes elegir entre distintos entornos de realidad virtual, como un cine en casa, un cine multipantalla y hasta la superficie de la luna.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

translations.long_description: L'applicazione ufficiale Video di Oculus è la tua sala cinematografica in realtà virtuale! Guarda trailer, clip e i tuoi file video in un modo completamente nuovo e coinvolgente. Puoi scegliere tra diversi ambienti di realtà virtuale, ad esempio home theatre, cinema multischermo e persino la superficie della luna.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

You can choose from multiple VR theater environments including a home theater, a multiscreen theater, and even the surface of the moon.
translations.short_description: Your official Oculus VR movie theatre! Watch immersive videos in fun environments – from a home theater to the moon’s surface!

changelog.change_log: - Invite button click on launch no longer crashes the app.

* New Editor's Choice section with curated video categories:
   * VR for Good - VR experiences that showcase the need for social change
   * Step on to the Stage - Front row seats at concerts and events
   * Animal Encounters - Up close look at wild animals
   * 360 Stories - Some of the best 360 3D short stories available
   * Become a Hollywood Star - 360 Videos from your favorite TV shows and videos
   * Explore the World - Explore the great pyramids, enjoy the northern lights, or fly over Iceland.
* Bug fixes

* New behavior for Oculus Go users: The 'My Videos' section will now direct you to use Oculus Gallery for media loaded onto device.
* Bug fixes

* Movie store new features:
- Ability to resume movies in the new 'Previously Viewed' tab or Resume button from movie description page
- Display 10 movies per page
* Fixed 'My Videos' section to correctly sort from a->z

* Added functionality so that after you watch a Facebook video, you can choose between 3 similar videos.
* Fixed Movie playback

* Improved error handling and messaging
* Bug Fixes

* My Videos will only show supported video formats
* Improved loading of categories 
* Fixed some back button functionality
